nodes.text: The Quenfis was an EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate that served with the New Republic Defense Fleet.

During the series of battles against Imperial Grand Admiral Thrawn that would become known as the Thrawn campaign, the Quenfis was assigned to the Home Guard Fleet. The vessel was placed under the command of Captain Sarin Virgilio by Borsk Fey'lya prior to its excursion to the Katana fleet, carrying Leia Organa Solo and Talon Karrde as well as Fey'lya himself. The frigate participated in the Battle for the Katana fleet that resulted when it arrived at the fleet's location just as an Imperial task force, including the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Judicator, arrived to reclaim the rest of the Dreadnaught-class heavy cruisers of the derelict force.
